title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 6-4-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 04, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation, 6-4-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ___________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                       June 4, 2009    VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION  Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS  Governor Ted Kulongoski (D-OR) Governor Bev Perdue (D-NC) Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger (R-CA) Governor Ted Strickland (D-OH)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES  Mayor Steve Brocket (D – Alamogordo, NM) Mayor Robert Reichert (D – Macon, GA) Mayor Bob Kiss (P – Burlington, VT)* Mayor Tim Hanna (R – Appleton, WI) Mayor John Marks (D – Tallahassee, FL) County Executive Jack Johnson (D – Prince George's County, MD) County Commissioner Bill Kennedy (D – Yellowstone County, MT)  *Party affiliation - Vermont Progressive Party
